void Swallow::UpdateFlock ( void   )  [protected]

This method is call every frame when the swallow is flocking. This function does all updates specifically required for flocking.

void Swallow::UpdatePanic ( void   )  [protected]

This method is call every frame when the swallow is panicking. This function does all updates specifically required for panicking.
